description.narrative: 'Objective 1: Raising awareness and understanding of people with disabilities, especially people with disabilities from ethnic minorities and other stakeholders about the rights to labor, employment, health care and education of the disabled. - To Develop a series of communication materials on rights and how to exercise rights related to health care, education, vocational training and employment, culture, physical training, sports, entertainment and tourism; access to social welfare according to the Lawon Persons with Disabilities. - To Communicate the rights related to health care, education, vocational and employment, culture, physical training, sports, entertainment and tourism; access to social welfare to 2000 people with disabilities. - At least70% of people with disabilities, ethnic minority people with disabilities and other stakeholders understand /are able to describe their rights related to health care, education, vocational and employment, culture, physical training and sports, entertainment and tourism; access to social welfare. Objective 2: Applying information technology in legal consultancy and legal support for people with disabilities and disabled people from ethnic minorities on issues related to labor, employment, healthcare and education. - 40 people with disabilities, people with disabilities from minor ethnic communities are capable of providing legal aid. - 500 people with disabilities, ethnic minorities access legal assistance, directly and via DLAW application - At least80% of people with disabilities, ethnic minorities with disabilities in need of legal defense are provided with legal defense. Objective 3: Advocacy on health insurance, school fee waivers, and promoting the proportion of people with disabilities in companies. - To send a letter of recommendations to stakeholders in order to advocate for issues related to health insurance, school fee waivers, and promoting the proportion of people with disabilities in companies. - At least 50% of stakeholders have feedback or propose improvement solutions.

participating-org.narrative:
'Disability Research and Capacity Development (DRD) has been making every effort day after day to contribute to an equal and non-discriminatory society for persons with disabilities (PWDs). DRD is working for an inclusive and barrier-free society, where PWDs havecapacity to participate in all activities equally and equitably.
DRD is committed to help PWDs be self-confident, and increase their quality of life in a non-discriminatory environment by raising the awareness of PWDs and the public, increasing capacity for PWDs, and promoting advocacy.
Disability Research and Capacity Development Center (DRD)

mailing-address.narrative: PO box 30919, 2500 GX The Hague, The Netherlands

sector.narrative: The right to social and political participation

receiver-org.narrative: Disability Research and Capacity Development Center (DRD)
Disability Research and Capacity Development Center (DRD)

description.narrative: Women and Men able to: # of people (M/F) living in poverty and injustice use their enhanced knowledge and skills to fullfill their rights on freedom of association, freedom of expression and to participate in public affairs.
men living in poverty and injustice use their enhanced knowledge and skills to fullfill their rights on freedom of association, freedom of expression and to participate in public affairs.

comment.narrative: Due to covid 19 pandemic, DRD had conducted activities online and offline, especially the organizer used digital flatform " Dlaw" to provide legal information, raising awareness and legal aid assistant to 86,000 time of people in disabilities about howthey access to healthcare insurance, job, education, etc
